archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Microsoft Power Automate (copy)
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Power Automate, formerly known as Microsoft Flow, is a service by Microsoft that allows users to automate workflows and tasks across multiple applications and services. It provides tools to create automated processes, integrating different platforms without the need for custom coding, thereby streamlining repetitive tasks and enhancing productivity. With a user-friendly interface, Power Automate supports both cloud-based and on-premises data sources, making digital automation accessible to a wide range of users.
